text: hi everyone today I will be making
stir-fry water spinach with garlic
Rahman South I what the spinach is a
very popular vegetable in Vietnam and
it's very cheap it's like when you can't
afford to buy anything else then buy a
bunch of water spinach to make this dish
but if you're living overseas it could
be even more expensive than meat now
what i'm doing here is breaking each day
more water spinach into 3 inch lengths
up to having washed the vegetables three
times I'm gonna blanch it in the pot of
boiling water for just about 30 seconds
don't forget to add in half a teaspoon
of salt in the boiling water the reason
why we're blanching the vegetable before
store frying is that we want to keep the
green color of the water spinach just
blanch for about 30 seconds and not too
long because we're gonna stir fry it
later and we don't want it to be too
soft
after that we drain the water spinach
and maybe rings under cold running water
to keep the green color of the vegetable
next we're going to crush and peel the
garlic
my secret to make this dish is use a
loss of garlic and do not mix just you
the whole clove of garlic and just
smashing them like this to release the
fragrance next hit the wok on high until
smoky then add in some vegetable oil and
fry the garlic until fragrant
then in the plunge water spinach
remember to bring them well otherwise is
going to splash adding a pinch of salt a
pinch of sugar or chicken stock and
something sauce to make it even more
Vietnamese
still really we're on high here so let
the ratchet olefinic salt for seasoning
and finally adding some oyster sauce to
make it more shiny the oyster sauce is
not salted it just gives the dish a
nicer shiny look and more flavor that's
it we are done it is so simple but
irresistible other than using water
spinach you can use other colored
vegetables for example here I have
Malabar spinach round multi which is
also very delicious and good for health
or you can use normal spinach you only
need to blanch water spinach before stir
frying for other cut up spinach you
don't have to do that so remember to eat
more vegetables and stay healthy
thank you for watching bye bye
